data.title: Halle Berry's boyfriend says he 'wasn't supposed to post' nude snap
data.meta_description: Halle Berry's boyfriend Van Hunt ‘accidentally' posted a racy naked photo while she sparked marriage rumors sharing snaps with her 'mother-in-law.'
data.text:
Halle Berry’s beau is seemingly in hot water after the 54-year-old shared an X-rated snap of the actress to celebrate Mother’s Day.

Van Hunt uploaded a picture on Instagram of the star from a salacious photoshoot last April as she stood on a sun-soaked balcony completely in the nude.

The X-Men star pressed her peachy rear into the intricate metal railing with her arm perfectly poised to block the camera’s view of her breasts.

She whipped her gorgeous wind-blown locks as she glimpsed back at the photographer with a startled look to complete the jaw-dropping image.

Van Hunt claimed he had accidentally posed the snap writing: “Oh s--t, I wasn't s'posed to post that!”

He also cheekily joked: “Happy Mother's day from the bottom... of my heart.

“You have to admit [that's] bada--... mutha right there!"

The risque snap earned some divisive comments while the Hollywood star posed with her bare flesh against the wrought iron railings.

Some claimed the post was “very tacky" or that Van Hunt should “consider her children before posting” while others praised Halle’s irrefutable natural beauty and added: “Those who don't have the courage nor the glutes need to move along.”

DON'T MISS:

The Oscar winner stirred some more hubbub in her fanbase as she later took to Instagram wishing Van Hunt’s mother a Happy Mother’s Day.

Sharing some selfies and photos with Doris Edwards Drayton, celebrating her “beautiful mother-in-law DJ!”

Doris responded in kind, calling Halle her “daughter” with Happy Mother’s Day wishes and signed off: “My son loves you and so do I.”

Their declarations whipped fans into a frenzy as they speculated if Halle and Van Hunt had secretly tied the knot away from their adoring public.

The movie star and the singer revealed their relationship in September 2020 and while they have three children between them, the pair are yet to welcome any together.

Halle is mom to 16-year-old Nahla Ariela with her ex Gabriel Aubry and 10-year-old Maceo-Robert with her ex-husband Olivier Martinez, who she divorced in 2016.

Van also has a teenage son, Drake, from a previous relationship.
